channel.title: VFX on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in VFX on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Wednesday’: How a Zombie and His Creation Made It to the Netflix Series
item.description: The visual effects supervisor and prosthetics designer break down the challenges of designing the zombie Slurp and Christopher Lloyd’s Professor Orloff in season two.
